entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
